short_summary: NRC-IRAP requires the services of Change Management Consultant(s) for a period of 3 years + 2 option years beginning in April 2023 to support the NRC-IRAP Business Application Transformation Initiative.
full_summary:
## Change Management Consultants Request for Proposal

### Overview

The National Research Council of Canada (NRC) invites qualified suppliers to submit a proposal for the provision of Change Management Consultant services. This request for proposal (RFP) is part of the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) program, which is used to deliver project-based services to support NRC's business requirements.

### Business Requirement

The NRC's Industrial Research Assistance Program (IRAP) requires the services of Change Management Consultants for a three-year period, with the option to extend for two additional years. The consultants will support the NRC-IRAP Business Application Transformation Initiative.

### Scope of Work

The scope of work includes:

* Providing Change Management Consultant services for the duration of the contract
* Supporting the NRC-IRAP Business Application Transformation Initiative
* Collaborating with NRC staff to develop and implement change management strategies
* Providing training and coaching to NRC staff on change management best practices

### Security Requirement

The contractor must meet the following security requirements:

* Company minimum security level: Reliability
* Resource minimum security level: Reliability

### Contract Details

* Proposed contract period: April 1, 2023 to March 31, 2026, with two option periods of one year each
* Estimated level of effort: Approximate 220 days per resource, per year

### Eligibility

This RFP is open only to suppliers who are already qualified under E60ZT-18TSPS and have a valid Tier 1:2.6 Change Management Consultants Levels 2 and 3 contract in place.

### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

Philippe G. Cléroux
 philippe.cleroux@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca

### Important Notice

Please note that this RFP is subject to quarterly refresh cycles. Suppliers who wish to learn more about the TSPS program and how to become a qualified supplier should contact SPTS.TSPS@TPSGC-PWGSC.GC.CA.

---

I have rewritten and rephrased the original text in a clearer and more professional manner. I removed unnecessary information and focused on the key details of the request for proposal. I also used proper formatting and headings to make the text easier to read.
